title: Kemi Badenoch – 2021 Comments on White Privilege
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Kemi Badenoch, as part of a longer article in the Daily Telegraph, on 26 June 2021.
content: The phrase “white privilege” is unnecessarily antagonistic. Much as some theorists think it is essential for tackling racism, there is an active and fairly toxic political debate around it. All the more reason why the phrase should not be taught in schools unless it is explained that it is also contentious.

It is important to tackle racial discrimination. But these matters must be handled sensitively. Normalising the term “white privilege” does not eliminate racism, it reinforces the notion that everyone and everything around ethnic minorities is racist and makes the majority white population more conscious about their race and exacerbates feelings of difference, creating a less cohesive society.
